thread.title: Funeral service information for Altee Tenpenny released

title: Funeral service information for Altee Tenpenny released
text:
Facebook Email Twitter Google+ LinkedIn Pinterest Funeral service information for Altee Tenpenny released Funeral service information for former running back Altee Tenpenny has been released in a statement on social media by the North Little Rock High School Football Department. Post to Facebook Funeral service information for Altee Tenpenny released Funeral service information for former running back Altee Tenpenny has been released in a statement on social media by the North Little Rock High School Football Department.  //on.kthv.com/1LObX4O   Join the Conversation To   Funeral service information for Altee Tenpenny released THV11 Staff, news source 5:56 a.m. CDT October 22, 2015 Altee Tenpenny CONNECT TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
NORTH LITTLE ROCK, Ark. (KTHV) â€“ Funeral service information for former running back Altee Tenpenny has been released in a statement on social media by the North Little Rock High School Football Department. 
The department said services will be held at Gaines Street Baptist Church in Little Rock. His home going celebration will be Sat., Oct. 24 at 11 a.m. 
North Little Rock Football also tweeted, requesting people check Cherry Hill in the morning on the way to the school for a special tribute for Tenpenny, though they did not give specific details on what the tribute would be. 
Tenpenny died Tuesday night during a single-vehicle accident in Mississippi. 
For more updates, follow @NorthLRFootball on Twitter.
